sentences.en: A scene of unparalleled grandeur is revealed late at night.
sentences.cn: 一派特别雄伟的景象,出现在深宵.

sentences.en: an achievement unparalleled in sporting history
Forged 1020 carbon steel structure - an unparalleled sense of a solid ball back.
sentences.cn: 锻造1020碳钢结构 - 无可比拟的扎实击球回馈感.

sentences.en: Germany's unparalleled prosperity is based on wise investments.
sentences.cn: 德国空前的繁荣是建立在明智的投资基础之上的。

sentences.en: Here the Allies stood and fought against tyranny in a giant undertaking unparalleled in human history.
sentences.cn: 在这里,盟国巍然屹立,打了一场人类历史上无与伦比的反对暴政的大战.

sentences.en: It was an unparalleled opportunity to develop her career.
sentences.cn: 这是她发展事业的绝好机会。

sentences.en: Milan is the atmosphere unparalleled, you can well here.
sentences.cn: 米兰的氛围真是无与伦比, 你能在这里过得很好.

sentences.en: Not only are these concerts unparalleled, these records will never be broken.
sentences.cn: 这次的演唱会,是前所未有的, 而这次的卖票纪录也是永远不可能被打破的.
我们的专家图书馆是独一无二的.

sentences.en: The country is facing a crisis unparalleled since the Second World War.
sentences.cn: 该国正面临着一场二战以来前所未有的危机。

sentences.en: The diversity and richness of the Bible as literature, especially the old Testament, are unparalleled.
sentences.cn: 作为一部文学作品,《圣经》, 特别是《旧约》的丰富多彩, 是前所未有的.

sentences.en: The pottery from our shop is all made By masters unparalleled.
sentences.cn: 本店陶器,均为名家制作,独一无二.

sentences.en: The pyramids are marvels of construction that are unparalleled throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 金字塔是世界上无与伦比的建筑奇迹.

sentences.en: The recent economic recession is unparalleled since the 1930 s.
sentences.cn: 最近的经济不景气是自三十年代以来最严重的一次.
我们有举世无双的人力资源.

sentences.en: With multimedia and highs appearing, display technique get unparalleled development.
sentences.cn: 随着多媒体及高清楚度电视(HDTV)的出现显示技术得到空前发展.

trans.tran_cn: 无比的，无双的，空前的，绝无仅有的，
trans.tran_en: bigger, better, or worse than anything else
